name.title: name
name.description: Zone name - so you'll know which zone you're looking at layer.

properties.title: properties
properties.description: A list of properties for this zone, in order. Property groups are identified by the prefix '#'. Properties that are not desired from a group can be removed with the prefix '!', as if it was never there.

zone_id.title: zone_id
zone_id.description: The Unique ID for the Zone Info.

xp.title: xp
xp.description: The amount of Experience Points earned on first discovery of the zone.

discovery_sounds.title: discovery_sounds
discovery_sounds.description: Toggles on/off the default discovery sounds for this zone. Useful for if you need to use quest_components for custom discoveries.

quest_components.title: quest_components
quest_components.description: The quest components ran on the player whenever the player discovers this zone.
